attributes.action: give ambulance crews the recognition they deserve. under agenda for change they have just had their salaries reduced by £3,500 per annum. this should be given back to the ambulance crews
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ambulance crews should be exempt from the agenda from agenda for change. how can we expect these men and women to save lives on the pittance they earn, how would you like to lose £3,500 a year without your consent
